Docs.summary: Gets the value of the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option for this ServerSocket, that is the proposed buffer size that will be used for Sockets accepted from this ServerSocket. -or- Sets a default proposed value for the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option for sockets accepted from this ServerSocket.
Docs.value: the value of the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option for this Socket.
